name: sap-sac-scripting
description: Comprehensive SAC scripting plugin for SAP Analytics Cloud Analytics Designer and Optimized Story Experience. Includes 4 specialized agents (debugger, performance optimizer, planning assistant, API helper), 4 slash commands (/sac-script-template, /sac-debug, /sac-optimize, /sac-planning), validation hooks for best practices, and extensive reference documentation. Covers DataSource API, Chart/Table manipulation, Planning operations, Calendar integration, Bookmarks, Timer API, Container widgets, R Visualizations, Custom Widgets, Navigation, debugging, performance optimization. Updated for Q4 2025 (2025.21) with Chart Variance APIs, Compass Seamless Planning, and Data Actions enhancements.
